Richard Gere y Alejandra Silva: Actor de Hollywood será padre por tercera vez a los 70 años


El actor de Hollywood, Richard Gere,  junto con la empresaria Alejandra, ya tienen un bebé de ocho meses y están a la espera de su tercer bebé.
Richard Gere y su esposa Alejandra Silva esperan a su segundo hijo en común. El actor y la empresaria se casaron en abril del 2018 y serán padres nuevamente. Según la revista ¡Hola!, la empresaria estaría embarazada de algo más de tres meses.



El bebé será el tercer hijo para ambos, ya que en relaciones anteriores tuvieron uno cada uno. Silva tienen un hijo de siete años llamado Albert, fruto de su anterior matrimonio junto a un magnate minero. Por su parte, el actor Richard Gere, tiene un hijo de 20 años llamado Homer, fruto de su anterior matrimonio con la actriz y modelo Carey Lowell.
La pareja, que dejó España para vivir en Nueva York, tuvo a su primer hijo Alexander en febrero de este año. Richard, de 70 años, le lleva a su esposa 34, una gran diferencia de edad que nunca ha sido impedimento para su amor, pues ya llevan varios años juntos. 
Un detalle sobre Silva es que nació católica, pero se convirtió al budismo, al igual que su pareja, es por eso que la boda contó con la presencia de monjes tibetanos.

Richard Gere expects his third child with his wife 36 years younger than him [PHOTOS]
Richard Gere surprised all his followers by confirming that he will be a father for the third time at the age of 70.
06 Nov 2019, 13:40 by Wapa.pe Writing

Hollywood actor Richard Gere, along with businesswoman Alejandra, already have an eight-month-old baby and are waiting for their third baby.
Richard Gere and his wife Alejandra Silva wait for their second child in common. The actor and businesswoman got married in April 2018 and will be parents again. According to the magazine ¡Hola !, the businesswoman would be pregnant for more than three months.



The baby will be the third child for both, since in previous relationships they had one each. Silva has a seven-year-old son named Albert, the result of his previous marriage with a mining mogul. Meanwhile, actor Richard Gere has a 20-year-old son named Homer, the result of his previous marriage to actress and model Carey Lowell.
The couple, who left Spain to live in New York, had their first child Alexander in February this year. Richard, 70, takes his wife 34, a big age difference that has never been an impediment to his love, since they have been together for several years.
A detail about Silva is that he was born a Catholic, but he converted to Buddhism, like his partner, that is why the wedding was attended by Tibetan monks.
